name: GitCopyDiff
description: A task that copies added/modified/renamed/moved files to a specified directory.
author: ATP P&I IT
helpMarkDown: copies added/modified/renamed/moved files to a specified folder with extension Changed and Deleted. ### Prerequisites * Repository must be Git. * Allow scripts to access Oauth must be **Enabled**

inputs.name: currentcommit
inputs.label: Current commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The current commit id. If not set the HEAD will be use.

inputs.name: destination
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where files should be placed.

inputs.name: changeType
inputs.label: Change Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify which files to copy by change type

inputs.name: gittag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag for given commit, the commit is used for finding the diff between the new one. Can be hashid.

inputs.name: flatten
inputs.label: Flatten
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten directory structure (all files to same directory)

inputs.name: testIfTagFound
inputs.label: Test if tag is found in branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, it will test if tag is found in branch, fail if not found

inputs.name: branchAsRoot
inputs.label: Use branch as root
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this branch as root if old commit (gittag) not found.

inputs.name: nameOfFileDeletedList
inputs.label: File name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file, that contains all url's to the files removed from the repository

inputs.name: textBeforeFile
inputs.label: Text before file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text before the url to the deleted file from repository

inputs.name: textAfterFile
inputs.label: Text after file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text after the url to the deleted file from repository
